summary: An Ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3418 for the improvement of Findlay Street, from 46th Avenue South to a point 330 feet east of 51st Avenue South; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; all in the City of Seattle, under Ordinance No. 42396, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
